channel.title: [REP ++] Making Zuriels Staff Able To Cast Magic [REP ++]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I recently added a Zuriels Staff to my game, but it's only got melee attack styles. It's Item ID is written in the Staff section in Client.java numerous times, compiled, no errors, still not working.
This is a Delta source.
DONT FORGET I'LL REP WHOEVER GIVES ME THE CORRECT FIX FIRST =O!
Thanks!
